pkgmetadata.longdescription: # mesonpep517This is a simple module that implements pep517 for the [meson] build system.This means that you only need to provide a `pyproject.toml` in your projectsource root to be able to publish your project built with meson on PyPiand to create a wheel for the project.For more information have a look at [the documentation](https://thiblahute.gitlab.io/mesonpep517/)[meson]: https://mesonbuild.com
